# Dream (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | [[Diirinka]], Kassegore, Lord of Mysteries |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

A few deities include dreams in their portfolios. The following domain is available to clerics of such deities, who often take the Dreamtelling and Oneiromancy feats.

**Granted Power:** Because you have long delved into dreams and nightmares, you are immune to fear effects.

**Dream Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Sleep (Spell)|Sleep]]****:** Puts 4 HD of creatures into magical slumber.

**2** **[[Augury (Spell)|Augury]]** **<sup>MF</sup>:** Learns whether an action will be good or bad.

**3** **[[Deep Slumber (Spell)|Deep Slumber]]****:** Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.

**4** **[[Phantasmal Killer (Spell)|Phantasmal Killer]]****:** Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.

   **[[Divination (Spell)|Divination]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

**5** **[[Nightmare (Spell)|Nightmare]]****:** Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.

   **[[Command, Greater (Spell)|Command, Greater]]****:** As *[[Command (Spell)|command]]**,* but affects one subject/level.

**6 [[Dream Sight (Spell)|Dream Sight]]:** Your spirit can leave your body and explore for 1 minute/level.

   **[[Symbol of Sleep (Spell)|Symbol of Sleep]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune puts nearby creatures into catatonic slumber.

**7** **[[Scrying, Greater (Spell)|Scrying, Greater]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** As *[[Scrying (Spell)|scrying]]*, but faster and longer.

**8** **[[Power Word Stun (Spell)|Power Word Stun]]****:** Stuns creature with 150 hp or less.

   **[[Mind Blank (Spell)|Mind Blank]]****:** Subject is protected from mental/emotional magic and scrying.

**9** **[[Weird (Spell)|Weird]]****:** As *[[Phantasmal Killer (Spell)|phantasmal killer]]*, but affects all within 30 ft.

   **[[Foresight (Spell)|Foresight]]****:** “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.
